name: jquery-tooltipify
description: jQuery Tooltipify creates a slide in stylable tooltip to replace the default browser tooltip.

scripts.build: uglifyjs "src/jquery-tooltipify.js" -o "lib/jquery-tooltipify.min.js" && node-sass src/tooltipify.scss lib/tooltipify.css & cleancss  lib/tooltipify.css -o lib/tooltipify.min.css

author: vincentkeizer
